Detailed Description

Form that shows an error message with optional additional information like the exception that caused the error.

Property Documentation

bool TwinEditor.UI.ErrorMessage.ShowReportButton [get, set]

Sets or gets the ShowReport property.

Determines whether the form should display a 'Report' button to the user.
